title: Python Certification
description: Achieved the Scientific Computing with Python certification from freeCodeCamp after completing 15 Python projects.

title: Practical Junior Penetration Tester (PJPT) Certification
description: Preparing for the TCM-Security Practical Junior Penetration Tester (PJPT) certification to validate offensive security proficiency through hands-on exploitation of networks, web applications, and Active Directory in a simulated enterprise network environment.
